BusinessAccount.IsPublished: Business published and available on Liberrex systems for users to search, book and share feedback.
BusinessAccount.Title: Business Account

Content: Data and privacy settings can be managed from here.
Business account settings can be managed from here.

DataAndPrivacy.DeleteHistoryDaily: Delete all data history every 24 hours and don't keep any records of business activity.
DataAndPrivacy.ShareData: Share business activity data with third party services in order to increase algorithm efficiency and accuracy.
DataAndPrivacy.ShareWaitingTime: Share waiting time and booking slots with public users
DataAndPrivacy.Title: Data & Privacy

DeleteAccountPrompt.Text: Are you sure you want to delete your business account? Please note that all data associated to this account will be deleted and you will not be able to recover it in the future. If this is a hard decision to make, you can simply unpublish your business until you make a final decision
DeleteAccountPrompt.Title: Delete Account

DeleteHistoryPrompt.Text: Are you sure you want to delete all activity data associated to your business account?
DeleteHistoryPrompt.Title: Delete History

MyLiberrex.BookingAllowAttachments: Customers can send attachments with booking requests.
MyLiberrex.BookingAllowed: Customers are allowed to book appointments.
MyLiberrex.QueueAllowed: Customers are allowed to join waiting lists.
MyLiberrex.QueueOnlyBooked: Customers can only join waiting lists if they have a confirmed booking on the same day.
MyLiberrex.QueueRequirePayment: Customers should pay fees before being able to join waiting lists.
MyLiberrex.Title: My Liberrex

Help.MembershipText: Basing on your historical data, our AI recommends the LIBERUP package for your business.
Help.TechnicalProblemText: If you are facing any technical problem please send screenshots to support@liberrex.com or call us on +44(0)7802-40-5359 for urgent assistance.
Help.UserGuideText:
Are you new to Liberrex and don't know yet how to use the platform? Don't panic, we have prepared
        documentation and videos for you that will guide you through all the features and account settings. Please click on the following link to go on our YouTube Channel.
